text: In Figure 2 , the numbers within the parentheses at the top of each panel show the value of the threshold Ï„ k,0.03 , calculated using the normal approximation used in the Appendix (equation 10), assuming an innovation variance of = 1 for the process. We examine the effects upon the sensitivity, specificity, and timeliness to detect anthrax outbreaks in the simulations that we present later.
